name: White Bean and Zucchini Soup
preparation: Turn the zucchini into noodles with a Spiral Slicer. Toss with dressing and set aside.
Combine remaining ingredients in a Multipurpose Steamer.
Microwave with lid on for 8 minutes on high.
Carefully remove from microwave, stir in zucchini noodles, and serve.
Turn zucchini into noodles with a Spiral Slicer. Toss with dressing and set aside.
Place the remaining ingredients in a Multipurpose Pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce to a simmer for 10–12 minutes.
Stir in zucchini noodles and serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with (or add to soup) 1⁄2 cup each baby spinach and cooked edamame. Enjoy with a toasted whole-wheat bun.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
